019package de.mnl.osgi.bnd.maven;
020
021import static aQute.bnd.osgi.repository.BridgeRepository.addInformationCapability;
022import aQute.bnd.osgi.resource.CapabilityBuilder;
023import aQute.bnd.osgi.resource.ResourceBuilder;
024import aQute.bnd.osgi.resource.ResourceUtils;
025import aQute.bnd.version.Version;
026import aQute.maven.api.Archive;
027import aQute.maven.api.Program;
028import aQute.maven.provider.MavenBackingRepository;
029import aQute.service.reporter.Reporter;
030import java.io.File;
031import java.io.IOException;
032import java.util.ArrayList;
033import java.util.Collection;
034import java.util.Collections;
035import java.util.HashSet;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.Optional;
039import java.util.Set;
040import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
041import java.util.concurrent.Executor;
042import java.util.function.Function;
043import java.util.stream.Collectors;
044import org.apache.maven.model.Dependency;
045import org.apache.maven.model.Model;
046import org.apache.maven.model.building.ModelBuildingException;
047import org.apache.maven.model.resolution.UnresolvableModelException;
048import org.osgi.framework.namespace.IdentityNamespace;
049import org.osgi.resource.Capability;
050import org.osgi.resource.Requirement;
051import org.osgi.resource.Resource;
052
053/**
054 * Wraps the artifacts from a maven repository as {@link Resource}s.
055 */
056public class MavenResourceRepository extends CompositeMavenRepository {
057
058    /** The namespace used to store the maven dependencies information. */
059    public static final String MAVEN_DEPENDENCIES_NS
060        = "maven.dependencies.info";
061
062    private Function<Archive, Optional<Resource>> resourceSupplier
063        = resource -> Optional.empty();
064    private final Map<Archive, MavenResource> resourceCache
065        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
066
067    public MavenResourceRepository(File base, String repoId,
068            List<MavenBackingRepository> releaseRepos,
069            List<MavenBackingRepository> snapshotRepos, Executor executor,
070            Reporter reporter) throws Exception {
071        super(base, repoId, releaseRepos, snapshotRepos, executor, reporter);
072    }
073
074    @Override
075    public void reset() {
076        super.reset();
077        resourceCache.clear();
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Sets a function that can provide resource information more
082     * efficiently (e.g. from some local persistent cache) than
083     * the remote maven repository.
084     * <P>
085     * Any resource information provided by the function must be
086     * complete, i.e. must hold the information from the "bnd.info"
087     * namespace and from the "maven.dependencies.info" namespace.
088     *
089     * @param resourceSupplier the resource supplier
090     * @return the composite maven repository
091     */
092    public MavenResourceRepository setResourceSupplier(
093            Function<Archive, Optional<Resource>> resourceSupplier) {
094        this.resourceSupplier = resourceSupplier;
095        return this;
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Creates a {@link MavenResource} for the given program and version. 
100     *
101     * @param program the program
102     * @param version the version
103     * @param extension the extension (or {@code null} for "jar")
104     * @param classifier the classifier (or {@code null} for "")
105     * @param location which URL to use for the binary in the {@link Resource}
106     * @return the resource
107     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
108     */
109    public Optional<MavenResource> resource(Program program,
110            MavenVersionSpecification version, String extension,
111            String classifier, BinaryLocation location)
112            throws IOException {
113        return find(program, version)
114            .map(revision -> resource(revision.archive(extension, classifier),
115                location));
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Creates a {@link MavenResource} for the given archive. 
120     *
121     * @param archive the archive
122     * @param location which URL to use for the binary in the {@link Resource}
123     * @return the resource
124     */
125    public MavenResource resource(BoundArchive archive,
126            BinaryLocation location) {
127        return resourceCache.computeIfAbsent(archive,
128            a -> resourceSupplier.apply(a)
129                .map(resource -> new MavenResourceImpl(archive, resource))
130                .orElseGet(() -> new MavenResourceImpl(archive, location)));
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Retrieves the dependency information from the provided
135     * resource. Assumes that the resource was created by this
136     * repository, i.e. with capabilities in the
137     * "maven.dependencies.info" name space.
138     *
139     * @param resource the resource
140     * @param dependencies the dependencies
141     */
142    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
143    private static void retrieveDependencies(Resource resource,
144            Collection<Dependency> dependencies) {
145        // Actually, there should be only one such capability per resource.
146        for (Capability capability : resource
147            .getCapabilities(MAVEN_DEPENDENCIES_NS)) {
148            Map<String, Object> depAttrs = capability.getAttributes();
149            depAttrs.values().stream()
150                .flatMap(val -> COORDS_SPLITTER.splitAsStream((String) val))
151                .map(rev -> {
152                    String[] parts = rev.split(":");
153                    Dependency dep = new Dependency();
154                    dep.setGroupId(parts[0]);
155                    dep.setArtifactId(parts[1]);
156                    dep.setVersion(parts[2]);
157                    return dep;
158                }).forEach(dependencies::add);
159        }
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * A maven resource that obtains its information
164     * lazily from a {@link CompositeMavenRepository}.
165     */
166    public class MavenResourceImpl implements MavenResource {
167
168        private final Archive archive;
169        private BoundArchive cachedArchive;
170        private Resource cachedDelegee;
171        private List<Dependency> cachedDependencies;
172        private final BinaryLocation location;
173
174        /**
175         * Instantiates a new maven resource from the given data.
176         *
177         * @param revision the archive
178         * @param location the location
179         */
180        private MavenResourceImpl(Archive archive, BinaryLocation location) {
181            this.archive = archive;
182            this.location = location;
183        }
184
185        /**
186         * Instantiates a new maven resource from the given data.
187         *
188         * @param revision the archive
189         * @param location the location
190         */
191        private MavenResourceImpl(BoundArchive archive,
192                BinaryLocation location) {
193            this.archive = archive;
194            this.cachedArchive = archive;
195            this.location = location;
196        }
197
198        /**
199         * Instantiates a new maven resource from the given data.
200         *
201         * @param revision the archive
202         * @param resource the resource information associated with the 
203         * archive.
204         */
205        private MavenResourceImpl(Archive archive, Resource resource) {
206            this.archive = archive;
207            this.cachedDelegee = resource;
208            // Doesn't matter, resource won't be created (already there).
209            this.location = BinaryLocation.REMOTE;
210        }
211
212        /**
213         * Instantiates a new maven resource from the given data.
214         *
215         * @param revision the revision
216         * @param resource the resource information associated with the 
217         * archive.
218         */
219        private MavenResourceImpl(BoundArchive archive, Resource resource) {
220            this.archive = archive;
221            this.cachedArchive = archive;
222            this.cachedDelegee = resource;
223            // Doesn't matter, resource won't be created (already there).
224            this.location = BinaryLocation.REMOTE;
225        }
226
227        @Override
228        public Archive archive() {
229            return archive;
230        }
231
232        @Override
233        public BoundArchive boundArchive() throws MavenResourceException {
234            try {
235                if (cachedArchive == null) {
236                    cachedArchive = find(archive).get();
237                }
238                return cachedArchive;
239            } catch (IOException e) {
240                throw new MavenResourceException(e);
241            }
242        }
243
244        @Override
245        public Resource asResource() throws MavenResourceException {
246            if (cachedDelegee == null) {
247                createResource();
248            }
249            return cachedDelegee;
250        }
251
252        /**
253         * Creates a {@link Resource} representation from the manifest
254         * of the artifact.  
255         *
256         * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
257         * @throws ModelBuildingException the model building exception
258         * @throws UnresolvableModelException the unresolvable model exception
259         */
260        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException",
261            "PMD.AvoidInstanceofChecksInCatchClause",
262            "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity", "PMD.NcssCount" })
263        private void createResource() throws MavenResourceException {
264            Model model = model(archive.revision);
265            String extension = model.getPackaging();
266            if (extension.equals("bundle")
267                || extension.equals("eclipse-plugin")) {
268                extension = Archive.JAR_EXTENSION;
269            }
270            ResourceBuilder builder = new ResourceBuilder();
271            if (extension.equals(Archive.JAR_EXTENSION)) {
272                File binary;
273                try {
274                    binary = get(archive);
275                } catch (IOException e) {
276                    throw new MavenResourceException(e);
277                }
278                try {
279                    if (location == BinaryLocation.LOCAL) {
280                        builder.addFile(binary, binary.toURI());
281                    } else {
282                        builder.addFile(binary,
283                            boundArchive().mavenBackingRepository()
284                                .toURI(archive.remotePath));
285                    }
286                } catch (Exception e) {
287                    // That's what the exceptions thrown here come down to.
288                    throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
289                }
290            }
291            List<Capability> caps = builder.getCapabilities();
292            Map<String, Object> idAttrs = caps.stream()
293                .filter(cap -> cap.getNamespace()
294                    .equals(IdentityNamespace.IDENTITY_NAMESPACE))
295                .findFirst().map(Capability::getAttributes)
296                .orElse(Collections.emptyMap());
297            String bsn = (String) idAttrs.getOrDefault(
298                IdentityNamespace.IDENTITY_NAMESPACE,
299                archive.getWithoutVersion());
300            Version version = ResourceUtils.toVersion(idAttrs.getOrDefault(
301                IdentityNamespace.CAPABILITY_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE,
302                archive.revision.version.getOSGiVersion()));
303            addInformationCapability(builder, bsn, version, archive.toString(),
304                null);
305
306            // Add dependency infos
307            if (!dependencies().isEmpty()) {
308                CapabilityBuilder cap
309                    = new CapabilityBuilder(MAVEN_DEPENDENCIES_NS);
310                Set<Dependency> cpDeps = new HashSet<>();
311                Set<Dependency> rtDeps = new HashSet<>();
312                for (Dependency dep : dependencies()) {
313                    if (dep.getScope() == null
314                        || dep.getScope().equalsIgnoreCase("compile")) {
315                        cpDeps.add(dep);
316                    } else if (dep.getScope().equalsIgnoreCase("runtime")) {
317                        rtDeps.add(dep);
318                    }
319                }
320                try {
321                    if (!cpDeps.isEmpty()) {
322                        cap.addAttribute("compile", toVersionList(cpDeps));
323                    }
324                    if (!rtDeps.isEmpty()) {
325                        cap.addAttribute("runtime", toVersionList(rtDeps));
326                    }
327                } catch (Exception e) {
328                    throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
329                }
330                builder.addCapability(cap);
331            }
332            cachedDelegee = builder.build();
333        }
334
335        private String toVersionList(Collection<Dependency> deps) {
336            StringBuilder depsList = new StringBuilder("");
337            for (Dependency dep : deps) {
338                if (depsList.length() > 0) {
339                    depsList.append(';');
340                }
341                depsList.append(dep.getGroupId());
342                depsList.append(':');
343                depsList.append(dep.getArtifactId());
344                depsList.append(':');
345                depsList.append(dep.getVersion());
346            }
347            return depsList.toString();
348        }
349
350        @Override
351        public List<Capability> getCapabilities(String namespace)
352                throws MavenResourceException {
353            return asResource().getCapabilities(namespace);
354        }
355
356        @Override
357        public List<Requirement> getRequirements(String namespace)
358                throws MavenResourceException {
359            return asResource().getRequirements(namespace);
360        }
361
362        @Override
363        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
364            if (obj == null) {
365                return false;
366            }
367            if (obj instanceof MavenResource) {
368                return archive.equals(((MavenResource) obj).archive());
369            }
370            if (obj instanceof Resource) {
371                try {
372                    return asResource().equals(obj);
373                } catch (MavenResourceException e) {
374                    return false;
375                }
376            }
377            return false;
378        }
379
380        @Override
381        public int hashCode() {
382            return archive.hashCode();
383        }
384
385        @Override
386        public String toString() {
387            return archive.toString();
388        }
389
390        @Override
391        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConfusingTernary")
392        public final synchronized List<Dependency> dependencies()
393                throws MavenResourceException {
394            if (cachedDependencies == null) {
395                if (cachedDelegee != null) {
396                    cachedDependencies = new ArrayList<>();
397                    retrieveDependencies(cachedDelegee, cachedDependencies);
398                } else {
399                    cachedDependencies = MavenResourceRepository.this
400                        .model(archive.revision).getDependencies().stream()
401                        .filter(dep -> !dep.getGroupId().contains("$")
402                            && !dep.getArtifactId().contains("$")
403                            && !dep.isOptional()
404                            && (dep.getScope() == null
405                                || dep.getScope().equals("compile")
406                                || dep.getScope().equals("runtime")
407                                || dep.getScope().equals("provided")))
408                        .collect(Collectors.toList());
409                }
410            }
411            return cachedDependencies;
412        }
413
414    }
415}
